title: Online Content-Based Job-Related Language Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device usage skills, entry-level job-related language knowledge
context.additional_context: Training program for working professionals combining real-time online lectures with content-based learning in smartphone-centric, limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can utilize beginner-level language expressions required in job contexts with 80% accuracy.
Learners can adapt and apply examples from online content to their own work contexts.
Learners can resolve over 70% of questions arising during learning through communication channels with peers.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
